name: Finally, Rescue Team
description:
A short game made in 3 days for Mini Jame Gam #5.
You are alone in a dark and cold forest. Can you survive before rescue team will arrive?

How to play:
Collect items and feed the furnace with wood to get warmer. Watch your temperature! If it becomes too low, you lose. Stay warm for 5 minutes to win the game.

Controls: 
WASD to move, E to interact.
